Name: Dark Abyss
About the game: 'Dark abyss' is a 2D Platform&Action&Maze game. How to play the game Look for the maze that's all over the place. Defeat the boss deep in the maze and gain the power of the boss. Use new power to explore more complex mazes and fight more difficult enemies. Maze System Trigger mechanism, open the corresponding door. Use the key to open the corresponding door. Clean up the enemies, get the key, or open the corresponding door. Move the stones and find the right way. Avoid traps and get rare items. Action System Using the combo attack, you can cause continuous damage to the enemy and accumulate the number of hits. Using the dash, you can move quickly on the ground and in the air, and you can also chop quickly. Using the second-jump, you can make a second jump in the air and reach a higher place. Using the sliding wall, you can slide slowly on the wall or bounce on the wall. Using the up-attack, you can hit the enemy into the air, or damage specific objects in the maze. Using the down-attack, you can hit the enemy to the ground and cause a certain range of damage. You can also damage specific objects in the maze.
